title: Voicemails do not load, message says waiting for better mobile connection
content:
For about the last 2 weeks, I have been getting an error on the Voicemail page saying Visual Voicemail cannot load because of a poor mobile connection.  But what's more troubling is that the phone tells me I have voicemails, but when I click on them it says "Loading Voicemail..." and eventually changes to "Couldn't load voicemail".  I see old posts about similar errors but nothing recent.  I did get live support last week, and the rep told me to clear the cache, which solved the problem for about an hour.  But it came right back again and has been busted ever since then.  Please suggest some ideas to fix this.  

Thanks,

Geoff
